title: Ok g it a new phone did security update and restored the device but my playstore would not update
content:
Soni had to do all the security updates and the Google play updates everything went fine but then I noticed my. Play store was on version 22 and. For some. Reason I could. It find and app called treatlife on the stove. But I can find it on my wife's 3a xl and I just downloaded it to my nexus 6p yesterday. 
I was able to update the store by installing the latest . APK. I just want this phone tr
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
